sqlMap.select: SELECT /* MACA0080.SEARCH00 광고주 순번 목록 조회 */ DISTINCT CASE WHEN CUST_NAME LIKE '%농심%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ORDERNO , A.TAXY_MONT , A.CUST_CODE /* 광고주코드 */ , A.CUST_NAME /* 광고주명 */ , TO_NUMBER(B.CUST_SEQX) CUST_SEQX /* 광고주순번 */ , A.TAXY_MONT /*세금계산서년월*/ FROM MD_SATXXH A LEFT JOIN MD_SEQXXM B ON A.CUST_CODE = B.CUST_CODE AND A.TAXY_MONT = B.TAXY_MONT WHERE A.TAXY_MONT = #YEAR_MNTH# AND A.CUST_CODE IS NOT NULL AND A.INPT_GUBN IS NULL ORDER BY CUST_SEQX, ORDERNO

SELECT /* MACA0080.SEARCH01 매체코드 순번 목록 조회 */ DISTINCT A.TAXY_MONT , A.MEDX_FLAG /* 매체코드 */ , B.COMM_CDNM AS MEDX_NAME /* 매체명 */ , TO_NUMBER(C.MEDF_SEQX) MEDF_SEQX /* 매체순번 */ , A.TAXY_MONT /*세금계산서년월*/ FROM MD_SATXXH A LEFT JOIN MD_CODEXM B ON A.MEDX_FLAG = B.COMM_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_SEQXXM C ON A.MEDX_FLAG = C.MEDX_FLAG AND A.TAXY_MONT = C.TAXY_MONT WHERE A.TAXY_MONT = #YEAR_MNTH# AND A.INPT_GUBN IS NULL ORDER BY MEDF_SEQX,A.MEDX_FLAG

SELECT /* MACA0080.SEARCH00 매체사 순번 목록 조회 */ DISTINCT CASE WHEN MEDX_CDNM LIKE '%농심%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ORDERNO , A.TAXY_MONT , A.MEDX_CODE /* 매체사코드 */ , A.MEDX_CDNM /* 매체사명 */ , TO_NUMBER(B.MEDX_SEQX) MEDX_SEQX /* 매체사순번 */ , A.TAXY_MONT /*세금계산서년월*/ FROM MD_SATXXH A LEFT JOIN MD_SEQXXM B ON A.MEDX_CODE = B.MEDX_CODE AND A.TAXY_MONT = B.TAXY_MONT WHERE A.TAXY_MONT = #YEAR_MNTH# AND A.INPT_GUBN IS NULL ORDER BY MEDX_SEQX, ORDERNO
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MD_SEQXXM( /* MACA0080.SAVE00 광고주 순번 입력 */ TAXY_MONT ,CUST_CODE ,CUST_SEQX )VALUES( #TAXY_MONT# ,#CUST_CODE# ,#CUST_SEQX# )
INSERT INTO MD_SEQXXM( /* MACA0080.SAVE00 매체구분 순번 입력 */ TAXY_MONT ,MEDX_FLAG ,MEDF_SEQX )VALUES( #TAXY_MONT# ,#MEDX_FLAG# ,#MEDF_SEQX# )
INSERT INTO MD_SEQXXM( /* MACA0080.SAVE00 매체사코드 순번 입력 */ TAXY_MONT ,MEDX_CODE ,MEDX_SEQX )VALUES( #TAXY_MONT# ,#MEDX_CODE# ,#MEDX_SEQX# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MD_SEQXXM /* MACA0080.UPDATE00 광고주 순번 수정 */ SET CUST_SEQX = #CUST_SEQX# /* 광고주순번 */ WHERE CUST_CODE=#CUST_CODE# AND TAXY_MONT = #TAXY_MONT#
UPDATE MD_SEQXXM /* MACA0080.UPDATE01 매체 순번 수정 */ SET MEDF_SEQX = #MEDF_SEQX# /* 매체순번 */ WHERE MEDX_FLAG=#MEDX_FLAG# AND TAXY_MONT = #TAXY_MONT#
UPDATE MD_SEQXXM /* MACA0080.UPDATE02 매체사 순번 수정 */ SET MEDX_SEQX = #MEDX_SEQX# /* 매체사순번 */ WHERE MEDX_CODE=#MEDX_CODE# AND TAXY_MONT = #TAXY_MONT#
sqlMap.select: SELECT /* MACA0080.getCUST_CODE 광고주코드 조회 */ COUNT(CUST_CODE) FROM MD_SEQXXM WHERE CUST_CODE=#CUST_CODE# AND TAXY_MONT = #TAXY_MONT#
SELECT /* MACA0080.getMEDX_FLAG 매체구분 조회 */ COUNT(MEDX_FLAG) FROM MD_SEQXXM WHERE MEDX_FLAG=#MEDX_FLAG# AND TAXY_MONT = #TAXY_MONT#
SELECT /* MACA0080.getMEDX_CODE 매체사코드 조회 */ COUNT(MEDX_CODE) FROM MD_SEQXXM WHERE MEDX_CODE=#MEDX_CODE# AND TAXY_MONT = #TAXY_MONT#
